main: Using her S3 or triggering her passive randomly applies {status:Combustion}, {status:Laceration}, {status:Vibration}, {status:Burst}, or {status:Sinking}.
S2 gains Coin Reuses and {status:Laceration} Count application and S3 gains damage depending on the number of debuffs on the target.
other: S3 gives her allies {status:Agility} on use and {status:PenetrateDamageUp} on stagger or kill and an additional {status:PenetrateResultUp} if it's another Ring identity.
Her support passive heals SP on kills for {status:Laceration} teams.

1110901.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on 1 enemy with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
(In Focused Encounters, a Part)
1110901.name: Multitude of Dots

1110902.desc: This Identity only counts as an 'Identity that inflicts [Laceration]'. This Identity's Skills that randomly inflict [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] do not count as Skills that inflict each respective Keyword.
1110902.name: Sanguine Pointillist

1110911.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict 2 Potency for 1 of the following effects on 2 enemies with the least types of negative effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
(In Focused Encounters, Parts)
1110911.name: Multitude of Dots

1110921.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 4 SP when defeating an enemy with [Laceration].
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 4. Once per turn)
1110921.name: Rough Sketch

1110931.desc:
1 ally with the least SP heals 4 SP when defeating an enemy with [Laceration].
Heal 1 additional SP for every type of negative effect on the target. (max 4. 3 times per turn)
1110931.name: Rough Sketch

data.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Clash Power +1
If target has 10+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
data.name: Dotting

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] 20% chance to Reuse Coin once. +20% more chance to Reuse Coin for every type of negative effect on target
[OnSucceedAttack] 20% chance to Reuse Coin once. +20% more chance to Reuse Coin for every type of negative effect on target

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Laceration] Count
When Reusing Coin with this unit's Coin effects, inflict +1 more [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] 40% chance to Reuse Coin. +20% more chance to Reuse Coin for every type of negative effect on target (2 times max per Skill)

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Laceration] Count
When Reusing Coin with this unit's Coin effects, inflict +1 more [Laceration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 Potency for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.
[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, apply 1 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn to 1 other ally with the highest SP

data.desc:
Deal +10% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 [Agility] next turn to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
data.name: Artwork Inspection

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 Potency for 1 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Effect selected at random.

[EndSkill] If target is Staggered or defeated, apply 1 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn to 1 other ally with the highest SP. If the affected ally is a member of the Ring, apply 1 [PenetrateResultUp] as well

data.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
Deal +12.5% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 50%)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 [Agility] next turn to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
data.name: Artwork Inspection
